articles.title: Ford issues three safety recalls affecting 42000 Canadian vehicles - CTV News
articles.description: Ford Motor Co. has issued three safety recalls affecting 850,000 vehicles in North America, including nearly 42,000 in Canada.
articles.content:
DEARBORN, MICH. -- 
Ford Motor Co. has issued three safety recalls affecting 850,000 vehicles in North America, including nearly 42,000 in Canada.
The largest recall involves 775,000 Explorers, inc… [+1301 chars]
